extendedInfo.description: Today Live Wallpaper is a photostreamer and a ticker showing all the latest from Google News including top stories, sport, entertainment and tech.Double tap the background wallpaper to activate the article browser and tap through to all the familiar sites including ABC, Fox, New York Times, CNBC, MSNBC, BBC, Guardian, Reuters, Telegraph, Wired, CNET and many more.US and UK content is available in this release.The following categories are available:Top StoriesUS / UKWorldEntertainmentSportTechnologyScienceBusinessPlease ensure that you have an unlimited data package or select the WiFi only option. By default Mobile and WiFi are selected. Downloads will be skipped when the battery level is less than 20%.If you have Android 2.1 with support for live wallpapers a version is available to try from http://get.photostreamer.net/
